data.name: Guide_Title
data.value: Project & Change Agent - Your Steering Guide

data.name: Guide_SelectQuestion
data.value: Select a question from the list to see the detailed answer.

data.name: Guide_Admin_A1
data.value:
📋 USER MANAGEMENT
1. Access ADMINISTRATION menu → Manage Team 2. You'll see the complete list of users 3. Double-click on a user to edit their profile 4. Change the role (Admin, Project Manager, Developer, Business Analyst) 5. Set access permissions to modules 6. Save changes with the Save button
💡 Roles determine access rights and available features.

data.name: Guide_Admin_A2
data.value:
📊 REPORTING & STEERING
ADMINISTRATION menu → Reporting tab
Two views available:
📊 PROGRAM VIEW: • Consolidated analysis of all program projects • Global KPIs: progress, velocity, workload • Task distribution by priority and status • Team and resource contributions • Comparative view before/during period
📁 PROJECT VIEW: • Detailed analysis of a specific project • Project health (On track / Delayed / Critical) • Completed vs in-progress tasks • Actual time vs estimated • Performance by developer
Filter by period for precise temporal analyses.

data.name: Guide_Admin_A3
data.value:
🤖 INTELLIGENT ANALYSES
AI automatically analyzes your data:
📊 PROJECT ANALYSIS (Reporting): • Steering recommendations • Risk detection • Workload optimization • Delivery forecasts
📈 DEVELOPER ANALYSIS (CRA Tracking): • Individual performance • Workload • Improvement suggestions
📉 STATISTICS ANALYSIS (Dashboard): • Global trends • Team KPIs • Focus points
✅ CRA VALIDATION (Timeline): • Compliance analysis • Anomaly detection • Automatic validation report
💡 AI requires an API token configured in Settings.

data.name: Guide_Admin_A4
data.value:
✅ CRA VALIDATION
1. ADMINISTRATION menu → Timeline (CRA Tracking) 2. Select the program or project 3. Check time entries by each developer 4. Use AI analysis to detect anomalies 5. Bulk validate with the 'Validate' button 6. A detailed report is automatically generated
📌 Validated CRAs are locked and can no longer be modified. 💡 AI alerts you to delayed tasks and time discrepancies.

data.name: Guide_Admin_A5
data.value:
📦 ARCHIVE MANAGEMENT
ADMINISTRATION menu → Archives
Features: • Archive obsolete or completed requests • View history of archived items • Restore items if necessary • Free up space in active backlog
To archive a request: 1. Open the request in REQUESTS 2. Click 'Archive' 3. Confirm the action
⚠️ Only administrators can archive and restore.

data.name: Guide_Admin_A6
data.value:
🔐 PERMISSION MANAGEMENT
ADMINISTRATION menu → Users & Roles
Permissions by role:
• Administrator: full access, reporting, archives, system management • Project Manager: backlog, assignments, CRA validation, statistics • Developer: task consultation, CRA entry, comments • Business Analyst: request creation, backlog consultation
Configuring permissions: 1. 'Roles' tab in Users & Roles 2. Check permissions for each role 3. Save changes 4. Users immediately receive new rights

data.name: Guide_Admin_A7
data.value:
🤖 AI CONVERSATIONAL AGENT
1. Click 'Chat with AI' at the bottom of this panel 2. First use: configure your API token - Go to https://genfactory-ai.analytics.cib.echonet - Generate a Bearer token in your profile - Paste it in configuration (Settings) 3. Ask questions about BacklogManager 4. AI knows all features
💡 AI can guide you step by step in your daily tasks.

data.name: Guide_CP_A1
data.value:
➕ TASK CREATION
1. Access BACKLOG menu 2. Click ➕ New Task button 3. Fill in information: • Clear and concise title • Detailed description • Assigned developer • Priority (Urgent, High, Medium, Low) • Estimated workload in hours • Associated project 4. Click Save
The task immediately appears in the backlog and Kanban.

data.name: Guide_CP_A2
data.value:
📋 KANBAN BOARD
KANBAN menu to visualize your workflow:
• Columns: To Do, Waiting, To Prioritize, In Progress, Test, Done • Drag and drop cards between columns • Filter by project or developer • Double-click a card to see details • Colors indicate priority • Real-time counters per column
💡 Kanban updates in real time for the entire team.

data.name: Guide_CP_A3
data.value:
📊 STATISTICS & ANALYTICS
STATISTICS menu to manage your team:
📈 KEY INDICATORS: • Completed vs in-progress tasks • Team productivity (%) • Average velocity • Workload per developer
📉 CHARTS: • Task evolution over time • Distribution by priority and status • Actual time vs estimated
🤖 AI ANALYSIS: Request intelligent analysis to get: • Steering recommendations • Risk detection • Improvement suggestions
Export statistics to PDF for your reports.

data.name: Guide_CP_A4
data.value:
👥 TASK ASSIGNMENT
Multiple methods:
1. From BACKLOG: • Select a task • Choose developer from list • Save
2. From KANBAN: • Double-click a card • Modify assignment
The developer automatically receives a notification.

data.name: Guide_CP_A5
data.value:
📈 PROGRESS TRACKING
Multiple indicators available:
• Dashboard: KPIs overview and charts • Kanban: Real-time task status • Timeline: CRA tracking by project and team • Statistics: Detailed charts and analyses • Notifications: Alerts on urgent tasks
💡 Export statistics to PDF for your reports.

data.name: Guide_CP_A6
data.value:
📝 REQUEST MANAGEMENT
1. REQUESTS menu to see all requests 2. Sort by criticality or date 3. Open a request to analyze it 4. Transform it into backlog tasks 5. Assign to developers 6. Update status
Business Analysts are notified of status changes.

data.name: Guide_CP_A7
data.value:
🔔 NOTIFICATION CENTER
NOTIFICATIONS menu (bell icon):
You are notified for: • New requests created • Blocked or delayed tasks • Comments on your projects • CRAs pending validation • Important status changes
Possible actions: • Mark as read • Go directly to item • Filter by notification type
The red badge shows the number of unread notifications.

data.name: Guide_Dev_A1
data.value:
⏱️ CRA ENTRY
1. ENTER CRA menu → Monthly calendar view 2. Click on a day to add time 3. Select the task from dropdown list 4. Enter hours worked 5. Add a comment if needed 6. Click Save
💡 Daily total displays at bottom. Aim for 7-8h per day. 📌 Validate your CRA at month-end before submission to project manager.

data.name: Guide_Dev_A2
data.value:
📋 TASK VIEW
Multiple views available:
• DASHBOARD: Your current and urgent tasks • BACKLOG: All your assigned tasks with filters • KANBAN: Workflow view with drag and drop
Double-click on a task to: • See complete description • Add comments • Change status • View history

data.name: Guide_Dev_A3
data.value:
✏️ TASK UPDATE
1. Open task from BACKLOG or KANBAN 2. Change status (To Do → In Progress → Test → Done) 3. Add comments about your progress 4. Update remaining time if necessary 5. Save changes
🔔 Project manager is notified of important changes.

data.name: Guide_Dev_Q4
data.value: How to create a special task?

data.name: Guide_Dev_A4
data.value:
✨ SPECIAL TASKS
To create a leave, support or other:
1. BACKLOG menu → ➕ button 2. Select type: 🏖️ LEAVE: Days off, RTT, vacation 🆘 SUPPORT: User assistance, helpdesk 📝 OTHER: Meetings, training, administrative 3. Fill in dates and duration 4. Add description if needed 5. Save
These tasks appear in your CRA and are counted in your workload.

data.name: Guide_Dev_A5
data.value:
🚨 REPORTING A BLOCKER
1. Open the blocked task 2. Add a detailed comment explaining: • Nature of blocker • Impact on schedule • Considered solution 3. Change priority to 'Urgent' if necessary 4. Save
💡 Contact your project manager via comments or directly to quickly resolve the blocker.

data.name: Guide_Dev_A6
data.value:
📊 CRA HISTORY
1. ENTER CRA menu 2. Use arrows to navigate between months 3. Days with time entries are colored 4. Validated days are locked (padlock) 5. Click on a day to see details
Visual indicators: • ✅ Green: complete and validated day • 🟡 Orange: partial day • ⚠️ Red: day without entry • 🔒 Padlock: validated CRA, not modifiable

data.name: Guide_Dev_A7
data.value:
🤖 AI ASSISTANCE
1. Click 'Chat with AI' 2. Configure your API token if first use 3. Ask questions like: • 'How to enter my CRA?' • 'Where to see my delayed tasks?' • 'How to report a bug?'
AI guides you step by step in your daily actions.

data.name: Guide_BA_A1
data.value:
➕ REQUEST CREATION
1. REQUESTS menu → ➕ New Request button 2. Fill in form: • Explicit title • Detailed description of need • Criticality (Low, Normal, High, Urgent) • Concerned project or service • Expected benefits 3. Add attachments if necessary 4. Submit request
The project manager receives a notification and analyzes the request.

data.name: Guide_BA_A2
data.value:
📊 REQUEST TRACKING
REQUESTS menu displays all your requests with:
• Current status (New, Analyzing, Accepted, In Progress, Done) • Creation date and last update • Assigned project manager • Comments and history
Filter by status or project to quickly find your requests. 🔔 You receive notifications at each status change.

data.name: Guide_BA_A3
data.value:
🎯 PRIORITIZATION
Use criticality to indicate urgency:
• URGENT: Immediate business impact, user blocker • HIGH: Important for operations, close deadline • NORMAL: Standard improvement, no strict deadline • LOW: Nice to have, can wait
Project manager considers these elements for planning.

data.name: Guide_BA_A4
data.value:
👥 COLLABORATION
1. Add detailed comments on your requests 2. Respond quickly to project manager questions 3. Participate in backlog refinement meetings 4. Validate proposed solutions 5. Test delivered developments
💡 The more precise you are, the faster your request will be processed.

data.name: Guide_BA_A5
data.value:
📋 BACKLOG CONSULTATION
BACKLOG menu to see:
• All planned tasks • Their progress status • Assigned developers • Estimates and time spent
Use filters to see only: • Your requests transformed into tasks • A specific project • A given sprint

data.name: Guide_BA_A6
data.value:
🤖 AI ASSISTANT
AI can help you:
• Write clear and complete requests • Understand your request status • Know how to track progress • Navigate in the application
Click 'Chat with AI' and configure your API token. Ask questions in natural language!

data.name: Guide_General_A1
data.value: Use the left side menu to access the different sections.

data.name: AIChat_AgentSubtitle
data.value: Your virtual assistant to manage your backlog

data.name: AIChat_WelcomeMessage
data.value: Hello! I am your virtual assistant to manage your backlog. How can I help you today? 😊

data.name: AIChat_WelcomeMessageFull
data.value:
### 👋 Hello! I'm **Agent Project & Change**
Your virtual assistant specialized in agile project management.
**I can help you with:**
• 📋 **Backlog**: Create and manage your tasks • 🎯 **Kanban**: Organize your workflow • ⏱️ **CRA**: Log and validate your hours • 📊 **Statistics**: Analyze your performance • 💡 **Advice**: Optimize your project management
---
💬 **Ask me your questions**, I'm here to guide you! 😊

data.name: AIChat_SendHint
data.value: Press Enter to send, Shift+Enter for a line break
